A4.text: The United States won its first Olympic gold medal and second World Championship.

A5.text: The 1980 gold medal is known as the Miracle on Ice.

A6.text: The United States won its second gold medal

A7.text: In 1999, Sports Illustrated named the 'Miracle on Ice' the top sports moment of the 20th century.
